languages.text: Динамики вокса, настроенного на частоту первого отряда, ожили, лампочка на корпусе загорелась, сигнализируя входящий сигнал. Спокойный голос командира Енхо Сона доложил, что отряд движется к мостику мертвого корабля в штатном режиме.

Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.
languages.original_text: Динамики вокса, настроенного на частоту первого отряда, ожили, лампочка на корпусе загорелась, сигнализируя входящий сигнал. Спокойный голос командира Енхо Сона доложил, что отряд движется к мостику мертвого корабля в штатном режиме.

traits.locale_text: Sound crackled from the vox speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signaling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

Sound crackled from the vox speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signaling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

Sound crackled from the vox speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signaling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

languages.text: Los altavoces del voco chisporrotearon y una luz de la carcasa se encendió, indicando que llegaba un mensaje en la frecuencia de la primera unidad. Su comandante, Young-ho Sohn, informó de que su unidad avanzaba a buen ritmo hacia el puente de la nave.
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Los altavoces del voco chisporrotearon y una luz de la carcasa se encendió, indicando que llegaba un mensaje en la frecuencia de la primera unidad. Su comandante, Young-ho Sohn, informó de que su unidad avanzaba a buen ritmo hacia el puente de la nave.

languages.text: 音阵的扬声器里传来了噼里啪啦的声音。外壳上的灯亮了起来，表示第一支小队那边传来了信息。小队指挥官宋永和平静地报告称，他的小队目前正在调查舰桥，已经取得了令人满意的进展。
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 音阵的扬声器里传来了噼里啪啦的声音。外壳上的灯亮了起来，表示第一支小队那边传来了信息。小队指挥官宋永和平静地报告称，他的小队目前正在调查舰桥，已经取得了令人满意的进展。

languages.text: ヴォクススピーカーから音がパチパチと鳴り、本体のライトが点灯して、最初の部隊の周波数でメッセージが入ってきたことを示す。ソン・ヨンホ司令は、自分の部隊が船のブリッジへと順調に進んでいることを落ち着いて報告した。
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: ヴォクススピーカーから音がパチパチと鳴り、本体のライトが点灯して、最初の部隊の周波数でメッセージが入ってきたことを示す。ソン・ヨンホ司令は、自分の部隊が船のブリッジへと順調に進んでいることを落ち着いて報告した。

languages.text: Ein Knistern aus den Vox-Lautsprechern und eine Leuchte am Gehäuse signalisierten den Eingang einer Nachricht auf der Frequenz der ersten Einheit. Commander Young-ho Sohn meldete nüchtern, seine Einheit mache auf dem Weg zur Brücke zufriedenstellende Fortschritte.
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Ein Knistern aus den Vox-Lautsprechern und eine Leuchte am Gehäuse signalisierten den Eingang einer Nachricht auf der Frequenz der ersten Einheit. Commander Young-ho Sohn meldete nüchtern, seine Einheit mache auf dem Weg zur Brücke zufriedenstellende Fortschritte.

languages.text: Les synthétiseurs-vox se mirent à crépiter, et une lumière s'alluma sur le boîtier, indiquant qu'un message avait été reçu sur la fréquence de la première unité. Le commandant Young-ho Sohn annonça calmement que son unité continuait à faire route vers la passerelle du vaisseau à un rythme satisfaisant.
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Les haut-parleurs du vox se mirent à crépiter, et une lumière s'alluma sur le boîtier, indiquant qu'un message avait été reçu sur la fréquence de la première unité. Le commandant Young-ho Sohn annonça calmement que son unité continuait à faire route vers la passerelle du vaisseau à un rythme satisfaisant.

languages.text: Voks hoparlörlerinden bir cızırtı yükseldi ve kasadaki ışık aydınlanarak ilk birimin frekansından mesaj geldiğinin haberini verdi. Sükûnetle konuşan komutan Young-ho Sohn, biriminin sorunsuzca köprüye ilerlediğini rapor etti.
languages.original_text: Sound crackled from the vox-speakers and a light on the casing switched on, signalling a message coming in on the first unit's frequency. Commander Young-ho Sohn calmly reported that his unit was making satisfactory progress toward the ship's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Voks hoparlörlerinden bir cızırtı yükseldi ve kasadaki ışık aydınlanarak ilk birimin frekansından gelen mesajın haberini verdi. Komutan Young-ho Sohn, biriminin sorunsuzca köprüye ilerlediğini rapor etti. Rapor verirken tüm sakinliğiyle konuşuyordu.
